## AReferenceCounted class

Provides a way to handle cleanup of manually managed resources where there is not a single owner. NB The object is pre-claimed (ref count 1) on creation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class AReferenceCounted implements IReferenceCounted, IOnFree 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IReferenceCounted](./rc-js-util.ireferencecounted.md)<!-- -->, [IOnFree](./rc-js-util.ionfree.md)

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [claim()](./rc-js-util.areferencecounted.claim.md) |  | Call when the object is received. |
|  [getIsDestroyed()](./rc-js-util.areferencecounted.getisdestroyed.md) |  |  |
|  [onFree()](./rc-js-util.areferencecounted.onfree.md) |  |  |
|  [release()](./rc-js-util.areferencecounted.release.md) |  | Call when done with the object. |
